title: Double Bluff - Book 1
description: Rhino poaching has reached endemic proportions on the Southern tip of the African continent. A fateful confluence of circumstances places Bruce Bryden in the firing line of the Dalerians, a ruthless conglomerate of mercenaries, corrupt government officials and unscrupulous politicians who will stop at nothing to get their hands on big money. Blood money. Bruce, with the help of his adopted daughter Alexis Guerra and ex-US Marine, Neil Allen, join forces to form the Triad. Their mission: infiltrate and eliminate the Dalerians. Using their military expertise, survival skills, intellect and charm they set out on a mission to eliminate the Dalerians, permanently.
author: Ben Child
